description: Statement for an account for a given billing cycle

available_credit_balance.description: The total available credit balance (in cents) for the account.

total_balance.description: The total balance (in cents) associated with the account.

account_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the account

effective_as_of_date.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE tell me what the account information was as if I had asked on `2020-10-20 00:00:00 EST`. If empty it defaults to current time.

min_pay_due_date.description: The `Date-Time` at which the minimum payment is due.

min_pay_amount_cents.description: The minimum amount (in cents) due for this statement.

billing_cycle_start_date.description: The inclusive starting `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

billing_cycle_end_date.description: The inclusive ending `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

total_due_amount_cents.description: The total amount (in cents) due for this statement - sum of current due and past due.

current_due_interest_amount_cents.description: For installment products, the current due interest amount (in cents) due for this statement.

current_due_principal_amount_cents.description: For installment products, the current due principal amount (in cents) due for this statement.

past_due_interest_amount_cents.description: For installment products, the past due interest amount (in cents) due for this statement.

past_due_principal_amount_cents.description: For installment products, the past due principal amount (in cents) due for this statement.

line_items.description: An array of line items included in the billing cycle.
